content: front loop of the stitch and the second goes in the back loop of the same stitch you make a single_crochet in the front loop of the single_crochet and ch1 single_crochet in the back loop of the same single_crochet and ch1 puff *yo insert your hook and pull up a loop repeat from * 3 more times inserting your hook into the same space yo and pull through all loops **notes** the top is made of two panels front and back if you want the top to be longer just add row to the front and back panel it s crocheted from top to bottom i recommend you watch my youtube tutorial if there are any uncertainties especially with assembling
